text: Muzabona abandi (muri abo bahakanyi bigira abemeramana) bashaka ko mubaha amahoro, ndetse (bakanigaragaza nk’abahakanyi) kuri bene wabo (b’abahakanyi) kugira ngo na bo babahe amahoro. Buri uko (bagenzi babo) babahamagariye gusubira mu buyobe barushaho kubujyamo. Bityo, nibatabareka ngo babahe amahoro, ngo banareke kubarwanya, icyo gihe muzabafate mubice aho muzabasanga hose. Abo ni bo twabahereye uburenganzira bugaragara (bwo kubarwanya)
